v-model.description: Defines the state of the component (shown/hidden); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive
v-model.description_zh: 定义组件的状态 （显示/隐藏）;使用此属性（以及 'update：modelValue' 事件的侦听器）或使用 v-model 指令
v-model.desc: Defines the state of the component (shown/hidden); Either use this property (along with a listener for 'update:modelValue' event) OR use v-model directive

breakpoint.description: Breakpoint (in pixels) of window width/height (whichever is smaller) from where a Menu will get to be used instead of a Dialog
breakpoint.description_zh: 窗口宽度/高度（以较小者为准）的断点（以像素为单位），从该断点开始将使用 Menu 而不是 Dialog

context-menu.description: Allows the component to behave like a context menu, which opens with a right mouse click (or long tap on mobile)
context-menu.description_zh: 允许组件的行为类似于上下文菜单，该菜单通过右键单击（或在移动设备上长按）打开
